SEARCH
Package domain.classes

Class Kmeans

java.lang.Object
domain.classes.Kmeans
public class Kmeans extends Object
Kmeans class implements the K-means clustering algorithm for grouping form answers

  • Field Summary

      Returns:

      Exception

      Exception

    • randomIni

      private ArrayList<Answer> randomIni()

      Returns:
      arrayList of int of K centorids at random,

    • kmeansPlus

      private ArrayList<Answer> kmeansPlus()
      Kmeans++ initialization, return a list with K indexes from the form responders, attempts to maximize distances between centroids
      Returns:
      ArrayList of k centroids generated by kmeans++

    • generateAffinityGroups

      private ArrayList<AffinityGroup> generateAffinityGroups(KmeansRes kr)
      From a KmeansRes create the affinity groups to store, sets the representative as the point closest to centroid, For each answer stores its responderUUID
      Parameters:
      kr -
      Returns:
      List of affinityGroup

    • evaluateClusteringSilhouete

      public double evaluateClusteringSilhouete()
      The Silhouette Score measures how well each data point fits within its assigned cluster compared to other clusters. Greater is better
      Returns:
      double in the range [-1.0,1.0]

    • evaluateClusteringWCSS

      public double evaluateClusteringWCSS()
      Returns the Within-Cluster Sum of Squares which shows how close the data points are to their cluster centroid Lower is better
      Returns:
